10.34 Million Total Pixels, Lens Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, Digital Zoom Magnification Upto 4x (Angle of View Equivalent to Approx: 348 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Motion Blur Reduction: Motion Detection (Still Pictures), Focus Range: Approx: 50 cm to Infinity, Approx: 5 cm to Infinit...View More
10.34 Million Total Pixels, Lens Construction: 6 Elements in 5 Groups, Digital Zoom Magnification Upto 4x (Angle of View Equivalent to Approx: 348 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Motion Blur Reduction: Motion Detection (Still Pictures), Focus Range: Approx: 50 cm to Infinity, Approx: 5 cm to Infinity (W) or Approx: 50 cm to Infinity (T) in Macro Close-up Mode, Focus-area Selection (Face Priority, Center, Manual (Tap to Select)), Frame Coverage (Shooting): Approx: 96% Vertical and Horizontal, Frame Coverage (Playback): Approx: 100% Vertical and Horizontal, Movie Frame Size (Pixels), HD 720p (1280 x 720), VGA (640 x 480), Exposure Control (2 EV in increment of 1/3 EV), Shutter Mechanical and Charge-coupled Electronic Shutter, Aperture Electronically-selected Neutral Density (ND) Filter (-3 AV), Flash Control TTL Auto with Monitor Preflashes, Data Transfer Protocol (MTP, PTP), 190 Pieces Still Pictures (with Built-in Battery), Movies (Actual Battery Life for Recording), EXPEED C2 Processing Engine, Intuitive Touch Screen Display, Operating Temperature: 0° C - 40° C, Operating Humidity: 85 % or Less (Condensation)
